channel.title: How can i make my client ip my own ip?
channel.description: hi i am a total noob to this and i was wondering: i downloaded a 317 client+source and i was wondering how to make the client so it works only with my ip

item.title: How can i make my client ip my own ip?
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

Search the existing ip fopr the client in client.java,gui.java[if you have it],egui.java[if u have it] it will be in one of those. then type in your ip and save it then compile.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make my client ip my own ip?

is the client an ip-changer client or does it already have an ip that it connects to?
